entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 12:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with freezing rain this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
